body.content:
Hello beloved,

Sorry to invade your privacy, I am Mrs. Danielle Kyle the wife of
Mr Robert Kyle, my husband worked as an auditor with a bank
for ten years before he died in the year 2012. When my late husband was alive
he deposited money in a with a bank.and This money is still with the bank,
I am in a hospital in the new York receiving treatment
I was affected with corona virus and my doctor has
confirmed to me that I have just a few days to live on earth due to my
esophageal cancer. Please I am choosing you to receive this money on
my behalf, and use it to help the less privileged.

As soon as I receive your response I will appreciate your selfless act
towards the less privilege,  I don't mind if you could be of trustful help.
I will be waiting to read from you urgently as time is of essence due
the limited time I have and my ill health condition.
I will give to you the contact of  my Attorney as he will be the one
to assist you in laying

claims for this money. Contact me on my private Daniella Kyle
Text me +15093924646
Reply  Emails Mr.danillekyle@yandex.com
our Sister ,
Mrs.Kyle
